mainText:
Mr. Jobs: 

You have been an inspiration, and I cannot explain how much you have touched
my life sir. Your technologies have undoubtedbly made this world a better
place, enhancing the lives of billions. His hard work, passion, and love for
Apple is unmeasurable. Steve, your hard work is inspiring and you have
become known as the best inventor of our time.

RIP
author: Parminder
